content:
Our new daily podcast gives you context and clarity on the stories shaping your world

ROBERT MUELLER, the special counsel, has at last delivered his report on possible links between President Donald Trump’s campaign and Russia. Will it have disappointed or empowered the Democrats in Congress who are still bent on investigating the president? And four years since storming to power in Greece, the hard-left Syriza party has broken many of its campaign promises. As an early election looms, we take a look at Syriza’s slow slide . Runtime: 21 min.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

The court then heard counsel for the dead woman's father.
法庭接着听取了女死者的父亲所请律师的陈述。
Therapists were brought in to counsel the bereaved.

Most experts counsel caution in such cases.
大多数专家建议在这样的情况下要谨慎从事。
He counselled them to give up the plan.
他建议他们放弃此项计划。

We should not jump to conclusions. Let's investigate first.
我们不应草率下结论， 还是先调查一下吧。
The government of the United States began at once to  the case.

Title: The Mueller report’s aftermath and Greece’s sinking Syriza party
